hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Red Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #lighting flames in the royal tomb# rewards #a Map of Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that an #invisible spinning blade# in the Shadow Temple guards...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Visible Chest
Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Invisible Chest
